header.name: 88 Flak Version 1.27 Soundtrack RC129+ 09/30/09
header.author: Please view Readme for credit
header.description:
THIS IS AN OPTIONAL PATCH, AND DOES NOT NEED TO BE ACTIVATED UNLESS YOU WANT THE DESIRED EFFECT FROM THE PATCH. Activate this AFTER activating Flak. Ignore FLMM's "incompatible" error messages.
Tired of Freelancer's default music? Want something a little more fitting to the combat of 88 Flak? Give this a spin. Please see the readme for more information on soundtrack selection.
This will not work with normal Freelancer.

item.name: Vanilla ST (new title screen tracks only)

option.name: Version 1.27, listed in server list as 88.27
